articles.title: The State of the World's Children 2023: For Every Child, Vaccination - Regional Brief: Middle East and North Africa [EN/AR] - Yemen - ReliefWeb
articles.description: Analysis in Arabic on Yemen and 20 other countries about Health, Protection and Human Rights and Epidemic; published on 20 Apr 2023 by UNICEF
articles.content:
For every child, vaccination
Immunization is one of humanity’s most remarkable success stories. It has saved countless lives. Many more lives will be saved if the goals of the Immunization Agenda 20… [+5566 chars]
